resources.string: Congrats! You\'ve successfully set up your {device_name}!

Setup was successful, but you\'re not the primary owner so we can\'t check if the {device_name} connected to the Internet. If you see the LED breathing cyan this means it worked! If not, please restart the setup process.

Setup process couldn\'t claim your {device_name}! If the {device_name} LED is blinking blue or green then you may have mistyped the Wi-Fi credentials and you should try setup again. If the LED is breathing cyan a server issue may have occurred - please contact support.

Setup process couldn\'t disconnect from the {device_name} Wi-Fi network. This is an internal problem with the device, so please try running setup again after resetting your {device_name} and putting it back in blinking blue listen mode if needed.

Setup process couldn\'t configure the Wi-Fi credentials for your {device_name}, please try running setup again after resetting your {device_name} and putting it back in blinking blue listen mode if needed.

Setup process lost connection to the {device_name} before being able to configure it to use the supplied Wi-fi credentials, please try running setup again after resetting your {device_name} and putting it back in listen mode if needed.
